Emerald Blossom Raasi Haram - A Touch of Tradition

₹23,678

Description

This Raasi Haram elegantly blends tradition with modern aesthetics. The high-quality materials, Hyderabadi polish, and unique design make it a valuable and eye-catching piece. The vibrant Emerald and Ruby accents add a touch of regal charm, making it a statement of sophisticated style.

Materials

  • 18K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish
  • Emerald (Oval Cut)
  • Rubies (Round Cut)
  • Polki Diamonds (Rose Cut
  • SI Clarity)
  • Simulated Pearls.

Features

This exquisite Raasi Haram features a delicate floral pendant centered with a vibrant Emerald. The design is a modern interpretation of traditional South Indian motifs, incorporating Polki diamonds in a pave setting for enhanced brilliance. The pendant is adorned with Ruby accents and finished with gracefully hanging simulated pearls. The delicate chain features emerald and ruby accents.
